moments.title: Valentine's Day
moments.notes: Major gifting occasion. Flowers, jewelry, dining, experiences.

moments.title: Mother's Day
moments.notes: Second Sunday of May in SA. Major gifting and dining occasion.

moments.title: Father's Day
moments.notes: Third Sunday of June. Gifting focus on tech, experiences, apparel.

moments.title: Black Friday
moments.notes: Biggest retail day of the year. Discounts across all categories.

moments.title: Cyber Monday
moments.notes: Online shopping focus. Tech and e-commerce deals.

moments.title: Easter Sunday
moments.notes: Family gatherings, chocolate and confectionery sales, travel.

moments.title: Eid al-Fitr (estimated)
moments.notes: End of Ramadan. Celebration, gifting, and feasting in Muslim communities.

moments.title: Diwali
moments.notes: Festival of Lights. Significant in Indian communities. Gifting, sweets, home decor.

moments.title: Matric Results Day
moments.notes: Annual release of high school final exam results. Education and celebration focus.
